content:
> "What's actually changed? Steel is still gone. Jobs are still leaving." - P4, Cleveland

> "The Democrats had decades to help us. They didn't." - P5, Youngstown

> "18 years. What's different? Nothing." - P10, Youngstown

> "Columbus alone cannot elect Brennan." - P4, Columbus

> "We're not a swing state anymore. We're red now." - P4, Cleveland

---
section: Key Quotes That Lost Us the Race
